## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm run test:unit` and `npm run test:integration`)
- [ ] CI passes
- [ ] Code follows project style
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] No sensitive data committed
